name: Nasha Market: Forge of a Thousand Trials
description: A type of blacksmith's workshop found in Nasha Town. Its large interior has been fitted with enormous cooling fans to maintain a tolerable temperature. The Rossum Workshop is one such establishment.\nThis type of workshop offers extensive services for anything you may need: well-balanced weapons, a simple kitchen knife, or just some ore smelting. Mundane or grand, every request is executed flawlessly.
